title: Exception thrown when trying to export data from a table with highlight and map rules
description:
Description: An exception is thrown when attempting to export data from the attached report.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a table to the report.
2. Configure the table to contain a group, a highlight rule, and a map rule in the group row.
3. Preview the report.

OB: An exception is thrown when trying to export data from the table with the highlight and map rules.

EB: Exporting data from a table with the highlight and map rules should not throw an exception.

SR: 1. Add a table to the report with a group, a highlight rule, and a map rule in the group row.
2. Preview the report.
3. Attempt to export the data from the table and observe that no exception is thrown.
